item.title: Post1
item.description: title: Telegram Bot for GitHub Actions date: “2020-04-01” description: Make a Telegram bot with Node.js and use it with GitHub Actions for sending notifications to you about the repo. tldr: Making GitHub Actions with Js Code Telegram Telegram is a cloud-based mobile and desktop messaging app with a focus on security and speed. It is free to use and extensively hackable. It also has a good bot support system. The API is also easy to implement and has many wrappers for building bots with the API.
